text: I opredelikha za Allakh chast ot posevite i dobituka, koito Toi e suzdal, i rekokha: “Tova e za Allakh! - spored tyakhnoto tvurdenie. - A tova e za sudruzhavanite ot nas.” Ala tova, koeto be za sudruzhavanite ot tyakh, ne stigashe do Allakh, a tova, koeto be za Allakh, stigashe do sudruzhavanite ot tyakh. Kolko losho ot·suzhdat
